metadata.name: 夜明けの漂流者-Castaway at Dawn-
metadata.description:
僕らは皆、どこかへ帰るために広い海を漂流している。

漂流していれば。絶望もあれば希望もある。

明けない夜はないと言う言葉。

何度もその言葉を

千切っては捨てただろうか。

夜が明ける兆しが見えた今。

その捨てたカケラを拾っている。

さあ、漂流しながらそのカケラを集めよう。

いつか完全に夜が明ける事を信じながら。

We are all adrift in the wide open sea, trying to get somewhere to go home.

If we are drifting. There is despair and there is hope.

There is no night that is not bright.

How many times have we

I have cut them into a thousand pieces and thrown them away.

Now that there are signs that the night is dawning.

I am picking up the pieces that I threw away.

Now, let's collect those fragments while drifting.

Believing that one day the night will dawn completely.

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
